Texto: 
compression and elevation of the left manstem bronchus.
intermediate density mediastinal mass
histoplasmosis lymphadenopathy
• foregut duplication cysts: bronchogenic cysts, enteric cysts, neurenteric cysts 
• neurogenic tumors (schwannoma, ganglioneuroma, neurofibroma)
• lymphadenopathy (infectious or neoplastic)
• congenital cystic adenomatoid malformation (ccam/cpam)
16 y.o. girl with progressively increasing cough and dyspnea.
adenopathy from histoplasmosis typically calcifies.  in this case it has yet to calcify.
